name: Signpost 1
Dialogue:
TRAINER TIPS
X ACCURACY boosts the accuracy of techniques! DIRE HIT jacks up the
likelihood of critical hits! Get your items at CELADON DEPT. STORE!

name: Signpost 2
Dialogue:
TRAINER TIPS
GUARD SPEC. protects POKEMON against SPECIAL attacks such as fire
and water! Get your items at CELADON DEPT. STORE!

name: Signpost 3
Dialogue:
ROCKET GAME CORNER
The playground for grown-ups!

name: Signpost 4
Dialogue:
Coins exchanged for prizes!
PRIZE EXCHANGE
Keep out of TEAM ROCKET's way!

This is my trusted pal, POLIWRATH! It evolved from POLIWHIRL
when I used WATER STONE!

name: Poliwrath
Dialogue: Ribi ribit!

I got my KOFFING in CINNABAR! It's nice, but it breathes poison
when it's angry!
The GAME CORNER is bad for our city's image!

Moan! I blew it all at the slots! I knew I should have cashed in
my coins for prizes!
What are you staring at?

Hello, there! I've seen you, but I never had a chance to talk!
Here's a gift for dropping by!
Oh, your pack is full of items!

TM41 reaches SOFTBOILED! Only one POKEMON can use it! That POKEMON
is CHANSEY!

name: Center 1
Dialogue: If I had a BIKE, I would go to CYCLING ROAD!

name: Center 2
Dialogue: POKE FLUTE awakens POKEMON with a sound that only they can hear!

name: Center 3
Dialogue: I road uphill on CYCLING ROAD from FUCHSIA!

name: Restaurant 4
Dialogue: Hi! We're taking a break now.

name: Restaurant 5
Dialogue: My POKEMON are weak, so I often have to go to the DRUG STORE.

name: Restaurant 6
Dialogue: Munch... The man at that table lost it all at the slots.

name: Restaurant 7
Dialogue: Psst! There's a basement under the GAME CORNER.

name: Restaurant 8
Dialogue:
Go ahead! Laugh! I'm flat out busted! No more slots for me!
I'm going straight! Here! I won't be needing this anymore!
Make room for this!
I always thought I was going to win it back...

Don't touch the poster at the GAME CORNER! There's no secret switch
behind it!
CHIEF! We just shipped 2000 POKEMON as slot prizes!
Hehehe! The slots just reel in the dough, big time!
POKEMON? No, this is a hotel for people. We're full up.

I'm on vacation with my brother and boy friend. CELADON is such a
pretty city!
My sis brought me on this vacation!
Why did she bring her brother?
I had a major haul today!
I sure do fancy that PORYGON! But, it's hard to win at slots!

name: Mansion Sign 1
Dialogue:
CELADON MANSION
Manager's Suite

name: Mansion Old lady
Dialogue: You look thirsty, do you want some tea?
Be back when YOU are thirsty
Ok, here you'll go

name: Mansion Old lady after
Dialogue: Hope you like my tea

name: Mansion 1
Dialogue: My dear POKEMON keep me company. MEOWTH even brings money home!

name: Clefairy
Dialogue: Pi pippippi!

name: Nidoran
Dialogue: Kya kyaoo!

name: Meowth
Dialogue: Meow!

name: Mansion Sign 2
Dialogue:
GAME FREAK
Meeting Room

name: Mansion Sign 3
Dialogue:
GAME FREAK
Development Room

name: Mansion 2
Dialogue:
I wrote the story! Isn't ERIKA cute? I like MISTY a lot too!
Oh, and SABRINA, I like her!

name: Mansion 3
Dialogue: I'm the graphic artist! I drew you!

name: Mansion 4
Dialogue: Me? I'm the programmer!

name: Mansion 5
Dialogue:
Is that right? I'm the game designer! Filling up your POKEDEX
is tough, but don't quit! When you finish, come tell me!

name: Mansion Sign 4
Dialogue: I KNOW EVERYTHING!

name: Mansion 6
Dialogue:
I know everything about the world of POKEMON in your GAME BOY!
Get together with your friends and trade POKEMON!

name: Mansion Blackboard
Dialogue:
TRAINER TIPS
Using a Game Link Cable

name: Mansion Pamphlet
Dialogue:
It's a pamphlet on TMs. ... There are 50 TMs in all. There are also
5 HMs that can be used repeatedly. SILPH CO.

name: Store sign
Dialogue: Find what you need at CELADON DEPT. STORE!

name: Sign store 1
Dialogue:
1F: SERVICE COUNTER
2F: TRAINER'S MARKET
3F: TV GAME SHOP
4F: WISEMAN GIFTS
5F: DRUG STORE
ROOFTOP SQUARE: VENDING MACHINES

name: Employee 1
Dialogue:
Hello! Welcome to CELADON DEPT. STORE. The board on the right
describes the store layout.

name: Sign store 2
Dialogue:
Top Grade Items for Trainers!
2F: TRAINER'S MARKET

name: Store 2
Dialogue: For long outings, you should buy REVIVE.

name: Store 3
Dialogue:
SUPER REPEL keeps weak POKEMON at bay... Hmm, it's a more powerful
REPEL!

name: Employee 2
Dialogue:
Oh, hi! I finally finished POKEMON! Not done yet? This might be
useful!
Your pack is full of items!
TM18 is COUNTER! Not like the one I'm leaning on, mind you!

name: Store 5
Dialogue:
Captured POKEMON are registered with an ID No. and OT, the name
of the Original Trainer that caught it!

name: Store 6
Dialogue: You can identify POKEMON you got in trades by their ID Numbers!

name: Store 7
Dialogue:
All right! My buddy's going to trade me his KANGASKHAN for my
GRAVELER!

name: Store 8
Dialogue: Come on GRAVELER! I love GRAVELER! I collect them!
Huh? GRAVELER turned into a different POKEMON!

name: Poster store
Dialogue: Player and Rival! Both are POKEMON!

name: SNES Games1
Dialogue: A fighting game! Looks tough!

name: SNES Games2
Dialogue: A sports game! Dad'll like that!

name: SNES Games3
Dialogue: An RPG! There's no time for that!

name: SNES Games4
Dialogue: A puzzle game! Looks addictive!

name: Sign store 4
Dialogue:
Express yourself with gifts!
4F: WISEMAN GIFTS
Evolution Special! Element STONEs on sale now!

name: Store 9
Dialogue: I'm getting a POKE DOLL for my girl friend!

name: Store 10
Dialogue:
I heard something useful. You can run from wild POKEMON by
distracting them with a POKE DOLL!

name: Store 11
Dialogue:
POKEMON ability enhancers can be bought only here. Use CALCIUM to
increase SPECIAL abilities. Use CARBOS to increase SPEED.

name: Store 12
Dialogue:
I'm here for POKEMON ability enhancers. PROTEIN increases ATTACK
power. IRON increases DEFENSE!

name: Store 13
Dialogue:
My sister is a trainer, believe it or not. But, she's so immature,
she drives me nuts!

name: Store 14
Dialogue: I'm thirsty! I want something to drink!
Give her a drink?
OPTIONS SHOULD APPEAR
OPTIONS SHOULD APPEAR

name: Game Corner Employee 1
Dialogue:
Welcome to ROCKET GAME CORNER! Do you need some game coins?
It's 1000$ for 50 coins. Would you like some?
No? Please come play sometime!
Thanks! Here are your 50 coins!

name: Game Corner Employee 2
Dialogue: Welcome! You can exchange your coins for fabulous prizes next door.

name: Game Corner 3
Dialogue: Hey, what? You're throwing me off! Here are some coins, shoo!
The trick is to watch the reels closely!

name: Game Corner 4
Dialogue: What's up? Want some coins?
You have lots of coins!
Darn! I need more coins for the POKEMON I want!

name: Game Corner 5
Dialogue: Games are scary! It's so easy to get hooked!

name: Game Corner 6
Dialogue:
Hey! You have better things to do, champ in making! CELADON GYM's
LEADER is ERIKA! She uses grass-type POKEMON! She might appear
docile, but don't be fooled!

name: Game Corner 6 after
Dialogue:
They offer rare POKEMON that can be exchanged for your coins.
But, I just can't seem to win!

name: Game Corner 7
Dialogue: I'm having a wonderful time!

name: Game Corner 8
Dialogue: I think these machines have different odds.

name: Game Corner 9
Dialogue: Kid, do you want to play?
You don't need my coins!
Wins seem to come and go.

name: Game Corner 10
Dialogue: Keep this quiet. It's rumored that this place is run by TEAM ROCKET.

name: Trainer Game Corner 11
Dialogue: I'm guarding this poster! Go away, or else!

name: Trainer Game Corner 11 after
Dialogue: Our hideout might be discovered! I better tell BOSS!

name: Rocket Poster
Dialogue: Hey! A switch behind the poster!? Let's push it!

name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: You broke into our operation?

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: You're not going to get away with this, brat!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Who are you? How did you get here?

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: Are you dissing TEAM ROCKET?

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: BOSS said you can see GHOSTs with the SILPH SCOPE!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: The TEAM ROCKET HQ has 4 basement floors. Can you reach the BOSS?

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Why did you come here?

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: OK, I'll talk! Take the elevator to see my BOSS!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Intruder alert!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: SILPH SCOPE? I don't know where it is!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: We got word from upstairs that you were coming!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: Go ahead and go! But, you need the LIFT KEY to run the elevator!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: Stop meddling in TEAM ROCKET's affairs!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: SILPH SCOPE? The machine the BOSS stole. It's here somewhere.

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: The elevator doesn't work? Who has the LIFT KEY?

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: Oh no! I dropped the LIFT KEY!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: Are you lost, you little rat?

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: Uh-oh, that fight opened the door!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: How can you not see the beauty of our evil?

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: BOSS! I'm sorry I failed you!

name: Trainer 11
Dialogue: I know you! You ruined our plans at MT.MOON!

name: Trainer 11 after
Dialogue: Do you have something against TEAM ROCKET?

name: Giovanni
Dialogue: So! I must say, I am impressed you got here!

name: Giovanni after
Dialogue:
I see that you raise POKEMON with utmost care. A child like you
would never understand what I hope to achieve. I shall step aside
this time! I hope we meet again...

name: Signpost Gym
Dialogue:
CELADON CITY POKEMON GYM
LEADER: ERIKA
The Nature Loving Princess!

name: Gym 1
Dialogue: Heheh! This GYM is great! It's full of women!

name: Plaque
Dialogue:
CELADON CITY POKEMON GYM
LEADER: ERIKA
WINNING TRAINERS:
Rival

name: Gym Trainer 1
Dialogue: Hey! You are not allowed in here!

name: Gym Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: Bleaah! I hope ERIKA wipes you out!

name: Gym Trainer 2
Dialogue: I was getting bored.

name: Gym Trainer 2 after
Dialogue:
Grass-type POKEMON are tough against the water-type!
They also have an edge on rock and ground POKEMON!

name: Gym Trainer 3
Dialogue: Look at my grass POKEMON! They're so easy to raise!

name: Gym Trainer 3 after
Dialogue:
We only use grass-type POKEMON at our GYM! We also use them
for making flower arrangements!

name: Gym Trainer 4
Dialogue: Aren't you the peeping Tom?

name: Gym Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: Oh, you weren't peeping? We get a lot of gawkers!

name: Gym Trainer 5
Dialogue: Welcome to CELADON GYM! You better not underestimate girl power!

name: Gym Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I didn't bring my best POKEMON! Wait 'til next time!

name: Gym Trainer 6
Dialogue: Don't bring any bugs or fire POKEMON in here!

name: Gym Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: Our LEADER, ERIKA, might be quiet, but she's also very skilled!

name: Gym Trainer 7
Dialogue: Pleased to meet you. My hobby is POKEMON training.

name: Gym Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: I have a blind date coming up. I have to learn to be polite.

name: Erika
Dialogue: Hello. Lovely weather isn't it? It's so pleasant.

...Oh dear... I must have dozed off. Welcome. My name is ERIKA.
I am the LEADER of CELADON GYM. I teach the art of flowing
arranging. My POKEMON are of the grass-type.

Oh, I'm sorry, I had no idea that you wished to challenge me.
Very well, but I shall not lose.

name: Erika after
Dialogue:
You are cataloging POKEMON? I must say I'm impressed. I would
never collect POKEMON if they were unattractive.
